about_the_game:
Lost Alone Ultimate - The Day Before (Demo) is a first-person psychological horror game that aims to instill anxiety, anguish and terror.
Experience the events that take place 24 hours before Lost Alone Ultimate starts.

PLOT: You are in George's apartment. Hanna's on her way and you need to be ready.

In this demo you will be able to experience some game mechanics such as:
  • 🔦 The search for key objects.
  • 🔦 The fear of the dark.
  • 🔦 The jumpscare.
  • 🔦 Real-time lighting.
  • 🔦 The puzzles.

Enjoy this mini experience. The demo content is exclusive and will not be found in the game.

name: Lost Alone Ultimate Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Lost Alone Ultimate is a first-person psychological horror game designed to convey anxiety, distress, and terror. Experience the day leading up to the events of Lost Alone Ultimate in George's creepy apartment.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
